title: Git Challenge: Rewind to a Specific Commit
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase. One of the most useful features of Git is the ability to rewind back to a specific commit. This can be helpful when you need to undo changes or revert to an earlier version of your code.
